snippet: The police said the victim, Reginald Brown, 46, was riding in Bedford-Stuyvesant when he was struck by a vehicle headed to a rubbish fire.
abstract: Brooklyn motorcyclist Reginald Brown is struck and killed by a fire truck heading to a blaze in Bedford-Stuyvesant; police say it is unclear who was at fault in the collision.

byline.original: By MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The police said the victim, Reginald Brown, 46, was riding in Bedford-Stuyvesant when he was struck by a vehicle headed to a rubbish fire.

headline.seo: Motorcyclist Killed by Fire Truck in Brooklyn
headline.main: Brooklyn Motorcyclist Killed by Fire Truck Headed to Blaze
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Motorcyclist Killed by Fire Truck Headed to Blaze
